org.deeplearning4j.ui.standalone

Class StaticPageUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.ui.standalone.StaticPageUtil

  • public class StaticPageUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Idea: Render a set of components as a single static page. The goal here is to provide a simple mechanism for exporting simple pages with static content (charts, etc), where (a) the required UI components, and (b) the data itself, is embedded in the page This is accomplished using a simple FreeMarker template
